title: Projects
description: Here are some of the projects I've worked on recently. Click on a project to learn more about it.

Portfolio.title: Software Developer
Portfolio.content: I built this portfolio website to showcase my skills and projects. It’s a single-page application created with React, JavaScript, TypeScript, and Sass. The site features a responsive design and smooth animations to provide an engaging user experience. I also integrated a contact form to make it easy for visitors to reach out to me.

React_Todolist.title: React Todolist
React_Todolist.content: This project is a simple to-do list application built with React and Sass. Users can add, edit, and delete tasks, as well as mark them as complete. The app features a clean, intuitive interface that makes it easy to manage tasks and stay organized. I implemented local storage to save tasks between sessions, ensuring a seamless user experience.

Could_Storage.title: Could Storage Service
Could_Storage.content: I developed a cloud storage service using Laravel, PHP, MySQL, HTML, and CSS. The application allows users to upload, download, and manage files in the cloud. I implemented user authentication and file permissions to ensure data security and privacy. The service features a clean, user-friendly interface that makes it easy to store and access files from anywhere.

Old_Portfolio.title: Old Portfolio Website
Old_Portfolio.content: This is my old portfolio website, which I built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The site features a simple, responsive design with a focus on showcasing my projects and skills. I included a contact form to make it easy for visitors to get in touch with me. While I’ve since updated my portfolio with a new design and additional features, this site remains a testament to my growth as a developer.
